mapper.insert: insert into accountflow (actionType, amount, note, usableAmount, freezedAmount, actionTime, accountId) values (#{actionType}, #{amount}, #{note}, #{usableAmount}, #{freezedAmount}, #{actionTime}, #{accountId})
mapper.update: update accountflow set actionType = #{actionType}, amount = #{amount}, note = #{note}, usableAmount = #{usableAmount}, freezedAmount = #{freezedAmount}, actionTime = #{actionTime}, accountId = #{accountId} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, actionType, amount, note, usableAmount, freezedAmount, actionTime, accountId from accountflow
